title: Ottawa Senators
summary: The Ottawa Senators (French: SÃ©nateurs d'Ottawa), officially the Ottawa Senators Hockey Club[lower-alpha 2] and colloquially known as the Sens, are a professional ice hockey team based in Ottawa. They compete in the National Hockey League (NHL) as a member of the Atlantic Division in the Eastern Conference, and play their home games at the 18,652-seat[4] Canadian Tire Centre, which opened in 1996 as the Palladium.
